mapper.insert: insert into product_order(order_no, user_id, user_name, user_phone, user_email, address1, address2, address3, address4) values(order_no_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{address4})
insert into product_order_info(order_info_no, order_no, product_cnt, product_price, product_info_no) values(order_info_seq.nextval, #{orderNo}, #{productCnt}, #{productPrice}, #{productInfoNo})
mapper.select: select * from product_order where order_no = (select MAX(order_no) from product_order)
select order_no, product_date from product_order where user_id = #{userId} order by order_no desc

select p.product_no, poi.order_no, po.product_date, p.product_name, p.product_img, pi.product_color, pi.product_size, poi.product_cnt, poi.product_price, po.address1, po.address2, po.address3, po.address4 from product_order_info poi join product_order po on poi.order_no = po.order_no join product_info pi on poi.product_info_no = pi.product_info_no join product p on p.product_no = pi.product_no where po.user_id = #{userId} and poi.order_no = #{orderNo}
